title: New Zealand vs Pakistan 2nd ODI abandoned
title_page: New Zealand vs Pakistan 2nd ODI abandoned | Daily Mail Online
text:
New Zealand vs Pakistan 2nd ODI abandoned
Rain washed out the second one-day international between New Zealand and Pakistan in Napier on Thursday.
Umpires Bruce Oxenford and Billy Bowden waited more than four hours for the weather to clear.
But when the rain finally stopped there was no sun to dry the waterlogged outfield and the match was abandoned.
New Zealand captain Kane Williamson (L) and head coach Mike Hesson inspect the field as rain delays the start of their second ODI match against Pakistan, at McLean Park in Napier, on January 28, 2016 Â©Marty Melville (AFP)
